sentences.en: " Our Pearl is a fitful and fantastic little elf sometimes.
sentences.cn: “ 我们的珠儿有时候是个让人捉摸不定的小精灵.

sentences.en: Although sleep is always fitful on trains, I dozed off more quickly than usual.
sentences.cn: 尽管在火车上我总是睡得很好, 我很快又瞌睡了.

sentences.en: And there are only fitful signs of renewed amity among diplomats.
sentences.cn: 在外交领域仅有点重新友好关系的迹象.

sentences.en: Colin drifted off into a fitful sleep.
sentences.cn: 科林迷迷糊糊地，时睡时醒。

sentences.en: Fitful gusts came winnowing through the smells of many distant fields.
sentences.cn: 不定的风吹来,含带着许多远野的香气.

sentences.en: He is the fitful person for this job.
sentences.cn: 他是这项工作的合适人选.

sentences.en: I spent a fitful night in the mud.
sentences.cn: 昨晚在泥地里断断续续地睡了一夜.

sentences.en: I worried half the night and have a fitful sleep.
sentences.cn: 我半个晚上都一直在担心,故而时醒时睡.

sentences.en: John awoke from a fitful sleep .
sentences.cn: 约翰从断断续续的睡眠中醒来。

sentences.en: John Barton had revived to fitful intelligence.
sentences.cn: 约翰·巴顿已经相当清醒.

sentences.en: Our Pearl a fitful and fantastic little elf sometimes.
sentences.cn: 我们的珠儿有时候是个让人捉摸不定的小精灵.

sentences.en: Sit not sad because that time a fitful aspect weareth.
sentences.cn: 不要因为时运不济而郁郁寡欢,忍耐虽然最痛苦.

sentences.en: Strike in chords from your harp fitful momentary rhythms.
sentences.cn: 在你的琴弦上弹出无定的暂时的音调吧.

sentences.en: The peace talks only seem to be making fitful progress.
sentences.cn: 和平会谈似乎时而前进，时而停滞。

sentences.en: The weird figures of the etching haunted my fitful sleep.
sentences.cn: 那幅版画上鬼怪似的人物形象在我辗转反侧的半睡眠中忽隐忽现.

sentences.en: Winterborne fell into a fitful sleep.
sentences.cn: 维思特波思不安稳地睡着了.

trans.tran_cn: 一阵阵的，不规则的，不稳定的
trans.tran_en: not regular, and starting and stopping often
